ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Case_Record_Type__c = 'Service Recovery Report' && (AND(Travel_by_Auto__c, Air_Travel_Local__c) || AND(Travel_by_Auto__c, Air_Travel_Region__c) || AND(Travel_by_Auto__c, Air_Travel_Btw_Regions__c) || AND(Air_Travel_Local__c, Air_Travel_Region__c) || AND(Air_Travel_Local__c, Air_Travel_Btw_Regions__c) || AND(Air_Travel_Region__c, Air_Travel_Btw_Regions__c)) && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select Only One Type Of Travel
